# Slick (Arm/ShldSpcAb)
## Overview
*Slick* armor seems coated at all times with a slightly greasy oil. It provides a +5 competence bonus on its wearer’s [[Escape Artist (Skill)|Escape Artist]] checks. The armor’s armor check penalty still applies normally.

Faint conjuration*;* CL 4th; [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Grease (Spell)|grease]]**;* Price +3,750 gp.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 464
